additionalContext.description: [Optional] A key-value map of additional context variables.

authorizerId.description: Specifies a test invoke authorizer request's Authorizer ID.

body.description: [Optional] The simulated request body of an incoming invocation request.

headers.description: [Required] A key-value map of headers to simulate an incoming invocation request. This is where the incoming authorization token, or identity source, should be specified.

pathWithQueryString.description: [Optional] The URI path, including query string, of the simulated invocation request. Use this to specify path parameters and query string parameters.

restApiId.description: Specifies a test invoke authorizer request's RestApi identifier.

stageVariables.description: A key-value map of stage variables to simulate an invocation on a deployed Stage.
